page.comparison.title: Weapon Comparison Tool
page.datamine.disclaimer: * Horizontal recoil does not behave in the way that you might assume.
For more info, see the shooting simulator in the Weapon Comparison Tool tab.
page.datamine.reload: Time to reload with empty magazine:
page.datamine.reloadAlt: Time to reload with nonempty magazine:
page.datamine.reloadDualMag: Time to switch between dual mags:
page.datamine.title: Enlisted Datamine
page.soldierStats.footer: Numbers in parentheses mean the net return in bronze orders if soldier is first upgraded to 5 stars, then sold.
Values for stars of a silver order~s result are experimental and may not be completely accurate.
page.soldierStats.header: This page contains the data of the optimal rolls for soldiers based on class and rank.
Actual soldiers may have between 0 and 2 points less in each category by random chance.
page.soldierStats.soldierDamageBody: Hover over each body part to see its damage multiplier.
Note: Both helmets and body armor reduce damage taken
to the body parts they cover by 10%.
page.soldierStats.title: Soldier Statistics
page.tanks.title: Tank Comparison Tool
perk.accurate_guidance: Improved targeting skills of a tank gun (gunner perk)
perk.crawl_crouch_speed: +{value} movement speed while crawling or crouching
perk.crawl_speed: +{value} speed in sitting or lying position
perk.drivingSpeedThresholdMult: -{value} speed loss after gear shift (driver perk)
perk.faster_aiming_point_return_after_fi: +{value} speed of returning of the aiming point to the initial position after firing the firearm
perk.faster_bolt_action: +{value} firing rate while using bolt action rifles
perk.faster_decreasing_of_maximum_shot_s: +{value} speed of decreasing of the shot spread after quick turning
perk.faster_self_fire_putout: +{value} speed of extinguishing fire on a soldier
perk.hp_regen_speed: +{value} health regeneration speed out of combat
perk.hp_regeneration: +{value} health regeneration amount out of combat
perk.less_base_kill_chance: Greater chance to get in downed state upon taking fatal damage
perk.less_camera_shake_on_explosions: -{value} effect of head-shaking caused by nearby explosions
perk.less_fall_dmg: -{value} damage when hard landing with a parachute
perk.less_hold_breath_cd: x{value} more often the ability to hold your breath can be used
perk.less_stopping_power: -{value} impact of enemy weapon stopping power on you
perk.more_stability_when_hit: +{value} aim stability with firearms after receiving damage
perk.pilot_awareness: +{value} angle of focused and peripheral vision
perk.pilot_head_stabilisation: -{value} effect of head-swinging during sharp maneuvers
perk.pilot_willpower: -{value} power of control loss after the blackout
perk.reload_reaction: Change the type of ammo without losing reload progress (loader perk)
perk.repairkit_economy_usage: +{value} to the number of uses of the repair kit
perk.seat_change_speed: +{value} speed of boarding, leaving and switching seats in the vehicle
perk.weight_run: -{value} weapon weight impact on movement speed
